name: Curt Corona, Private Eye
description:
Curt Corona, Private Eye

This is a game I made for DTC 354 at Washington State University. You play as a private eye, investigating the death of a popular professor. Most of the backgrounds and characters are hand-drawn by me, with some images, music and SFX sourced from copyright free websites. The game was made in a little over two weeks. 

Let me know what you think!
